messages.subject: Nyoraido (Buddha Hall) Pictures
messages.msgSnippet: Serizawa Kamo contributed more pictures for us https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/Nyoraido.zip (1.15mb)temporary hosting until they are reduced further
messages.messageBody:
Serizawa Kamo contributed more pictures for us
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/Nyoraido.zip
(1.15mb)temporary hosting until they are reduced further and moved to
Shinsengumihq.com permanently---he took the pictures on a very
beautiful day!

To read about Nyoraido in Saitou Hajime's please see "files"
"SAitou Hajime Translations" and see the chronology
September 5, 1868--battle fought with other remaining members of the
Shinsengumi
